main event: A witness observed a light blue-grey object approximately 30 to 40 feet in diameter hovering at an estimated altitude of 2000 to 3,000 feet for about 10-15 minutes before it disappeared abruptly.
interesting points: The witness observed a light blue-grey object approximately 30 to 40 feet in diameter.
The object was hovering at an estimated altitude of 2000 to 3,000 feet.
The object was observed for about 10-15 minutes before it disappeared abruptly.
The witness also reported seeing what appeared to be undersized creatures similar to humans, possibly not more than four feet tall, wearing regular trousers and T-shirts.
The witness spoke coherently but appeared to be under certain mental strain, though he claimed he was not frightened by the incident.
sighted object: light blue-grey object approximately 30 to 40 feet in diameter
